additional_notes: The document is a sworn statement with a clear indication of being an original copy. It contains a header with the state and county information, followed by the title of the investigation and the name of the person giving the statement. The document includes the date, time, and location of the statement, as well as the reporter's information and contact details. The footer contains page numbering and a public records request number.
